channel.title: Posts on In the Road
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on In the Road

item.title: PMBOK
item.description: 1 引论 项目组合管理通过选择正确的项目集或项目，对工作进行优先排序，以及提供所需资源，来与组织战略保持一致 Portfolio management aligns portfolios with orgnizational strategies by selecting the right programs or projects, prioritizing the work, and providing the needed resources. 项目集管理对其组成部分进行协调，对他们之间的依赖关系进行控制，从而实现既定收益 Program management harmonizes its program components and controls interdependencies in order to realize specified benefits. 项目管理使组织的目的和目标得以实现 Project management enables the achievement of orgnizational goals and objectives. The purpose of OPM is to ensure that the orgnaization undertakes the right projects and allocates the resources appropriately.
